entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is a massive figure who burst open his door and is surrounded by people attempting to Stun him.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione cries out in response to the commotion outside.

entities.name: professor tofty
entities.description: Professor Tofty is scandalized by the commotion and reminds everyone that it's an examination.

entities.name: mars
entities.description: Mars is mentioned in the context of Venus being mislabelled.

relationships.description: Hagrid is surrounded by people attempting to Stun him.
Hermione reacts to the commotion outside.
Professor Tofty reminds everyone that it's an examination.
Hagrid is somehow bouncing off the red light.
